aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.subtitle: Your journey to excellence starts here
aboutUs.description: Your first destination for travel and tourism, where we offer a selection of the best destinations and exclusive deals for unforgettable experiences around the world.
aboutUs.subtitle2: Your journey to excellence starts here
aboutUs.description2: At our institution, we believe true quality starts with small details. We work passionately and professionally to provide you with exceptional services and experiences that exceed your expectations. Our goal is to be your first choice through our constant commitment to development and innovation.

terms.intro: By using our services, you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully before booking.

use.text: Al-Asal services are provided to you on the condition of accepting these terms without modification. Using the services constitutes your agreement to these terms.
use.restrictionsText: You agree to use the services only for lawful personal purposes and not for making fake or fraudulent bookings, or interfering with operations in any way.
use.changesText: Al-Asal reserves the right to modify or discontinue services, or change terms at any time without notice. Continued use means you agree to the changes.
use.privacyText: We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data according to our Privacy Policy.
use.accountText: If you create an account, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login data and for all activities under it.

items: All bookings are subject to confirmation and availability.
30% of the total amount is required to confirm a booking.
The final payment must be completed 30 days before travel.
Prices are subject to change until final booking.
Additional conditions may apply depending on service providers.

liability.disclaimerText: Al-Asal provides services 'as is' without any explicit or implied warranties. We do not guarantee uninterrupted, error-free services.
liability.limitsText: Al-Asal bears no responsibility for indirect, consequential, or incidental damages arising from the use or inability to use services, or for personal, material losses or delays beyond our control. The traveler is responsible for personal insurance and visas.

items: We are not responsible for the loss of personal belongings.
We reserve the right to amend these terms at any time.

privacy.intro: We care about your privacy and are committed to protecting your data.

dataCollection.text: We collect information from you when you use our website or apps, whether during registration, booking, or communicating with us. This includes personal information such as your name, email, phone number, and booking data, as well as technical data such as your IP address, device ID, and location data with your consent.

dataUsage.text: We use the data we collect to provide better services, complete booking and payment procedures, send booking details and itineraries, improve user experience, support customer service, send marketing offers with your prior consent, and analyze activities to enhance services. We also use the information to respond to official authorities when required.

dataProtection.text: We are committed to protecting your data using the latest security technologies. We protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction, and limit access to authorized personnel only.

thirdParties.text: We may share your data with service providers who help us provide our services, such as payment companies, booking agents, telecom companies, and travel services. Data may also be shared with government authorities upon request or as required by law. We do not share your data with any third party for marketing purposes without your explicit consent.

mobileAppData.text: When you use the Al Asal Travel app, we may collect additional information such as device ID, IP address, location data (with prior consent), booking data, and travel details. This data is used to complete bookings, enhance website services, send notifications like flight schedule changes, and ensure security.

cookies.text: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience. Cookies allow us to remember your preferences, improve performance, and provide personalized content. You can change your cookie settings in your browser at any time.

contact.text: For any inquiries or requests related to our privacy policy, please contact us.
contact.title: Contact Information:
contact.agency: Al Asal Travel and Tourism Agency

faq.sectionSubtitle: Find answers to common questions below.

tabs.tab1Title: What are the best travel destinations in winter?
tabs.tab2Title: Can I change my travel dates?
tabs.tab3Title: What are the visa requirements for Europe?
tabs.tab4Title: How can I cancel my booking?

answers.tab1: Top winter destinations include places like Switzerland for skiing, or Red Sea areas like Sharm El Sheikh and Hurghada for warm weather.
answers.tab2: Yes, you can change your travel dates depending on your package's policies. Additional fees may apply.
answers.tab3: Visa requirements vary depending on your nationality and destination. Check with the respective European consulate or embassy.
answers.tab4: Yes, cancellations are possible based on your package's cancellation policy. Fees may apply depending on timing.
answers.tab5: Yes, we offer custom trips for groups and companies, including planning, guides, and exclusive accommodation options.

profile.noDataText: Once you book any trips, you'll see them here.
